content: introducing the patience angel crochet pattern a delightful project suitable for all skill levels this easy-level pattern creates an angel approximately 7 inches tall and 5 inches wide skirt diameter the pattern includes detailed instructions in both written and photo tutorial formats making it easy to follow along a video tutorial is also available **unique features-** easy level pattern suitable for beginners detailed photo tutorial written instructions and video tutorial included top-down construction for seamless finish worked in the round technique for a polished look customization options for personalizing your angel **materials needed-** yarn red heart super saver solids in aran weight approximately 100 yards hooks 4mm us size 6 0 2 25mm us size 1 0 **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** ♥ rhondda instagram https
